description:
Lightweight replacement of Lenovo Vantage for Lenovo Legion laptops.

Lenovo Legion Toolkit (LLT) is a utility created for Lenovo Legion laptops, that allows changing a couple of features that are only available in Lenovo Vantage or Legion Zone.
Release Notes
Version 2.29.0.1
Channel: Dev
Release Note
- Re-implement the Update Method.
- Move all update-related options into UpdateSettings.
- Bump dependency versions.
- Hide the PBO window for Intel laptops.
- Security update: Check for file certificates when downloading from the server side.
- Localization update.
